articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: AI finds its way into Apple’s top apps of the year - TechCrunch
articles.description: Although Apple has continued to avoid naming a dedicated AI app or AI chatbot as its app of the year, AI was showcased among this year's winners.
articles.content:
Apple on Thursday shared its annual list of App Store Award winners, continuing its tradition of celebrating the best apps and games of the past year. 
For 2025, the winning iPhone app was visual pl… [+1638 chars]
